purpose: The email is a call for proposals for satellite events to complement the main conferences of the ETAPS 2026, which will take place in Torino, Italy, from April 11 to 16, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit their proposals by June 26, 2025, and outlines the responsibilities of the satellite event organizers as well as the support provided by the ETAPS organizing committee.
evidence_sentences: The ETAPS 2026 organizing committee invites proposals for satellite events (e.g., workshops) to complement the main conferences.
Deadline for proposals of satellite events: June 26, 2025
Researchers and practitioners wishing to organize a satellite event are invited to submit their proposal to the Satellite Events Chairs.
